text: :This article refers to the Japanese composer, Közi's album. Izayoi no Tsuki is a soundtrack for the book Izayoi no Tsuki (十六夜の月) by Minako (水無湖). It was composed by the ex Malice Mizer guitarist, Közi. ==Track listing== #"Kakera" #"Izayoi no Tsuki" #"Zashikirou" #"Misemono Koya" #"Tsukiyo" #"Houmonsha" #"Akatsuki Yoru" #"Mawaru Wa~Kioku" #"Genmu" #"Kaikou" #"Kaikou" (Instrumental) Category:2002 albums
title: Izayoi no Tsuki
